task.title: Program Profiles
task.shortdesc: Each program participant will have a unique persona, Program Profile, for each program. This record will be used to track the Contact or Account's lifecycle in relation to the program.

context.p: To create a new Program Program from the Program detail page:

step.cmd: Navigte to the Program Profile related list. Click the New Program Profile button. (The Program looks up to the Program record and autopopulates.)
Link Program Profile record to a Contact (and an Account (if Program Entity is Account) .
